songs.title: Eye of the Needle
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
Take me down
I'm feeling now
And if I move on
I admit you're gone

[Pre-Chorus]
And I ain't ready
But I'll hold steady
Yeah I'll hold you
In my arms, in my arms
In my arms, whoa

[Chorus]
You're locked inside my heart, whoa
Your melody's an art, whoa
I won't let the terror in, I'm stealing time
Through the eye of the needle

[Verse 2]
Step and repeat
Tears fall to the beat
Smile through the pain
Feel the acid rain

[Pre-Chorus]
And I ain't ready
But I'll hold steady
Yeah I'll hold you
In my arms, in my arms
In my arms, whoa

[Chorus]
And you're locked inside my heart, whoa
And your melody's an art, whoa
I won't let the terror in, I'm stealing time
Through the eye of the needle

[Bridge]
My bags' heavy
Been filled by me
They weigh me down
Carry them round
It's all mine, all mine
Oh I am blinded by the eye of the needle

[Chorus]
You're locked inside my heart, whoa
Your melody's an art, whoa
And I won't let the terror in, I'm stealing time
Through the eye of the needle, eye of the needle
You're locked inside my heart, whoa
And your melody's an art, whoa
And I won't let the terror in, I'm stealing time
Through the eye of the needle
